alert.note: Alert for Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued May 10 at 1:24AM MDT until May 10 at 1:45AM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 145 AM MDT FOR SOUTH CENTRAL WELD COUNTY... At 123 AM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Barnesville to near Hudson, or along a line extending from 14 miles northeast of Greeley to 30 miles northeast of Denver, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Eastern Greeley, Kersey, Gill, Milton Reservoir and Barnesville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
